member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects
member.summary: Easing effects for progress animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.BounceIn
member.summary: Jumps towards, and then bounces as it settles at the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.BounceOut
member.summary: Leaps to final values, bounces 3 times, and settles.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicIn
member.summary: Starts slowly and accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicInOut
member.summary: Accelerates and decelerates. Often a natural-looking choice.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.CubicOut
member.summary: Starts quickly and the decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.Linear
member.summary: Linear transformation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinIn
member.summary: Smoothly accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinInOut
member.summary: Accelerates in and decelerates out.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SinOut
member.summary: Smoothly decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SpringIn
member.summary: Moves away and then leaps toward the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.EasingEffects.SpringOut
member.summary: Overshoots and then returns.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects
member.summary: Contains values for the EasingEffects enumeration that about to easing effects for indeterminate indicator animation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.BounceIn
member.summary: Jumps towards, and then bounces as it settles at the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.BounceOut
member.summary: Leaps to final values, bounces 3 times, and settles.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicIn
member.summary: Starts slowly and accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicInOut
member.summary: Accelerates and decelerates. Often a natural-looking choice.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.CubicOut
member.summary: Starts quickly and the decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.Linear
member.summary: Linear transformation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinIn
member.summary: Smoothly accelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinInOut
member.summary: Accelerates in and decelerates out.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SinOut
member.summary: Smoothly decelerates.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SpringIn
member.summary: Moves away and then leaps toward the final value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.ProgressBar.IndeterminateEasingEffects.SpringOut
member.summary: Overshoots and then returns.
